column1: #Text=Raiko says : " The Earth Kingdom is in chaos .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You 're the perfect person to take charge .
#Text=The world leaders trust you , and , as a Beifong , you have credibility in the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=" Suyin says : " I 'm honored that you thought of me , but I 'm not interested in imposing my ideals on an entire nation .
#Text=I 'm afraid I ca n't help you .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Suyin , I know this is n't my place , but I think you should do this .
#Text=Zaofu has always been a beacon of modern progress , and now you can share that with everyone .
#Text=" Suyin says : " What would you have me do ?
#Text=March into Ba Sing Se with an army ?
#Text=We 'd be seen as conquerors and greeted with nothing but war .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " There are already wars .
#Text=The Earth Queen nearly destroyed our nation .
#Text=This is our opportunity to change things .
#Text=" Suyin says : " It 's not going to happen .
